messages.title: YOUR SEAT COUNTS AND EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT
messages.content: Some people say Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter who you vote for in Stockton South constituency.

messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest â€“ and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: BACK ME AND JAMES WHARTON WITH YOUR POSTAL VOTE HERE IN STOCKTON SOUTH CONSTITUENCY
messages.content: If you want to make a real difference, back me by voting for my candidate, James Wharton, in your local constituency of Stockton South. You will have a say in a strong and stable government, that will deliver the best Brexit deal for you and for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring strong and stable leadership to guarantee the best Brexit deal for security and prosperity, negotiating the nuances of Brexit to ensure economic security and ensuring every child gets a good school place and working people can buy a home of their own.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Jeremy Corbyn seen as a 20-1 outside chance for the Labour leadership. A vote for anyone but the Conservative candidate could result in a coalition of chaos.

issues.brexitEurope: Negotiating a strong Brexit deal, Leaving the European Union, Ensuring economic security.
issues.education: Ensuring every child gets a good school place.
issues.socialWelfare: Working people can buy a home of their own.

housing.content: Ensuring working people can buy a home of their own.

endorsements.endorsement: Pledging support for James Wharton, emphasizing the need for a strong and stable government.

quotes.text: Deliver the best Brexit deal for you and for Britain.

images.caption: Rt Hon Theresa May Prime Minister
